title: Taric's VO is here!

embed.description: This is the voice for the new champion Taric in English. Note: The Voice might not be final, you never know what tweaks Riot might make to it. For League of Legends Related News Check Out Surrender@20: http://www.surrenderat20.net/ Feel Free to Follow me on Twitter as well: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights

body: Take a listen, courtesy of Surrender@20 and Skinspotlights!

replies.body:
"Who would have guessed the Aspect of the Moon could be so beautiful?" 
....
...
Taric? You going for Diana?

It's not like it confirms him as straight.
He is just admiring beauty in all forms and shapes, thats it.
They never confirmed him gay either.
Dude, look at the look he's giving Ezreal in his Fifth Age skin. Dude fancies the man.
could be one of those looks you give your friends to mess with them, ezreal looks like he's laughing a bit if you ask me
Ezreal is smiling because Taric is going to shwooba hooba dooba him so hard tonight.

He has the confidence and prescense to swing all ways.

Oh gosh I need him now. This is gonna be long week (or two).
I always preferred to look at him as a bi
I think the term pansexual is what your looking for
I know, was just joking about the double meaning implied.
Keep off Taric, Diana belongs to Leona.
Too late my ship is sailing.

> [{quoted}](name=Quickpaw,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RK6LHpjl,comment-id=00070001,timestamp=2016-04-05T21:41:23.991+0000)
>
> Keep off Taric, Diana belongs to Leona.

Leona is like an abusive significant other now, she's like a super mean zealot lol

Plus "Shine on you crazy diamond!" 
We got our JoJo reference guys, we did it!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Actually that's a Pink Floyd reference also used by JoJo.

Get off my lawn kiddo.

*Waves cane*
Diamond is unbreakable? Wait I have only been able to see episode 1!! WHERE DID YOU WATCH THE REST?!?!
Actually i also read the manga.... And 2nd episode only aired today.

Something about his VO seems a little...off to me.  I'm not quite sure what it is though.

Also, "The Aspect that everybody hates." reference to {{champion:80}}?  If so, then fucking ow Taric.  Fucking ow.

War.
Huh!
What is it good for?
Absolutely nothing, oh huh!
Say it again!
{{champion:55}} Violence solves everything Kappa
I think there's not enough ham in it, he's taking it a little too seriously.

This is actually amazing. Many of the reworks so far had lots of lines, but they didn't express the champion's character as strongly as before. NOT THIS ONE. 
Wow.
Just.
Also, I giggled at _"You can always use some extra protection."_ Sex ed teacher Taric.

EDIT:

BEAUTY CAN BE DEADLY, AND MANLY. VERY MANLY.
~~Riot hold me I can't~~

EDIT2: HE HITS ON ASHE AND DIANA
I wish his voice was deeper like his original, though. And can we take that echo effect off? Great lines otherwise.
Yuri Lowenthal. That is my bet on his VA.
You would be correct!

A question that popped to my mind.

Will it ever happen that champions not recieving updates in terms of visual/gameplay will recieve some more VO lines in order to interact with new/reworked character and fit better Lore updates?

To be more on Target: {{champion:131}}, {{champion:89}} and {{champion:80}}.

Diana's Lore has changed a lot of her character (or better, showed us more) and even more with Pantheon. Considering how interconnected are with Aurelion Sol and Taric I think that few more lines should be added.

It's always possible, though we don't have anything planned right now. As for Pantheon, he's fairly high on our list to get a full VGU. Not the top of our list but pretty high. When he does get a full VGU he will of course get all new VO.

I'd be interested to see who's on your list 

Yorick Ryze warwick urgot swain morde pantheon anyone else?
Everyone forgets Galio ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RK6LHpjl,comment-id=000400000003000000020000,timestamp=2016-04-06T18:54:19.113+0000)
>
> Everyone forgets Galio ;)

Oh my god 

I feel like I fell for a meme trap

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RK6LHpjl,comment-id=000400000003000000020000,timestamp=2016-04-06T18:54:19.113+0000)
>
> Everyone forgets Galio ;)

What about Evelynn{{champion:28}} ?  The champion who was promised a VU back in July 2012?
She's also pretty high on the VGU list
Warwick?
Wait do you mean your gonna rework him?!?! Pls don't I love him! Nobody knows just how strong he is with Nunu!
Plz let him still wanting to be a baker.
ooooooooo Cant wait for Pantheon VGU

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RK6LHpjl,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-04-05T19:47:27.195+0000)
>
> You would be correct!

Damn Straight! Now give me my 200 RP. Just kidding, I am just glad I got it right so early. 


Thanks for the reply and peace.

Wow that means Sasuke and Sakura are in this game :o
Thank you, you just made a Naruto fan very happy.
I thought that sounded like the english dub Sasuke... I can't complain though. It's a well done VO
About time Diana got some love.

Was thinking the same: 
https://youtu.be/11KvQOoIm28?t=14m25s

{{champion:44}} x {{champion:131}} it is then :D

And that made her so hot that she's on fire https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-20JEbfMqm_0/VwQZHz2oryI/AAAAAAAANDI/uTgXImIP13EQF9BWo15f_lWLR7lrCSgMw/s1600/dianaturn.jpg

"The Aspect everyone hates. "

Well thank you Taric for summing up my opinions on the Pantheon lore change.

It's amazing, they reboot two very old champions, except one they got really right, and the other they got really wrong.

And it's hilarious to see the good one taking the piss of the bad one.

"The taint of the Void is upon you"

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
"Beauty can be deadly.. and manly... veeeery manly!"
Where. Is. The. Sacred. Joke?
I'm sorry, he speaks and all I hear is Sasuke Uchiha and Suzaku Kururugi
